name: Caldwell - Lost and Found - Blue Collar - Robusto
brand: Caldwell, Lost and Found, Blue Collar
additionalNotes: The Caldwell Lost andFound Blue Collar is part of the Lost&Found series of small batch cigars. Each release of the Blue Collar line will feature a different blend and will be available at a wallet-friendly price. The Lost andFound is a special project founded by Robert Caldwell and Jaclyn Sears of Caldwell Cigars and Tony Bellatto of La Barba Cigars. The project was conceived during Caldwellâ€™s travels through Caribbean and Central American cigar factories where he would find carefully aged and well-maintained cigars that were once popular or limited releases.
